review_data.title: Super Preis Leistung! Originales
review_data.content: Super Preis Leistung! Originales Thai essen in Zürich. Super authentisch von Thai gekocht und preiswert.

review_data.title: Super tasty
review_data.content: This restaurant seems to appear also under "Boussaha". Excellent thai food juste like in Thaïland!! The whole family love it. We'll be back!

review_data.title: Nice option to have in the area.

review_data.title: Great tasting thai food very reasonably priced
review_data.content: We were craving for thai food and came across this place situated very close to the church in the old town. Very nice food and reasonable portions for a good price.

review_data.title: Great food for great price.

review_data.title: Sehr gut
review_data.content: Das Essen ist sehr fein und Preis günstig. Ich war sehr zufrieden. Ich empfehle, sehr nah bei der Limmat.

review_data.title: Nicht wirklich was besonderes

review_data.title: Would go again

review_data.title: Delicious Thai food
review_data.content: This small restaurant is serving a delicious Thai food,it’s perfect place to have your meal.It is a self serves and I strongly recommend it.

review_data.title: Genuine Thai food in the very centre of Zurich
review_data.content: I went for dinner during a business trip and ate very good and tasty curry chicken for a very reasonable price and very good amount. Highly recommended

review_data.content: It's late and cold, and in unfamiliar place - we found this food shop. It's almost closing but they are still available. Few selection, cold food and we decided to take out some rice and vegetable. Taste acceptable.

review_data.title: Good and relatively cheap thai food

review_data.title: Very good Thai Food

review_data.title: Real Thai food
review_data.content: Real Thai food in downtown Zurich. Fresh and tasting right. Thai staff so you know they can cook it the way it should be!

review_data.title: Simple, authentic, inexpensive
review_data.content: This very simple Thai eatery offers a type of street food at affordable prices. Although soups are expensive. Do not expect funky decor or anything, but the food is tasty. It can get busy, and you cannot book. It is possible to pay by card.

review_data.title: Super fein, schnell und günstig

review_data.title: Decent enough Thai place
review_data.content: Came here for a late lunch alone - it has long opening hours. A precooked tofu yellow curry was sweet and lukewarm, though the spicy sauces were good.

review_data.title: Very good affordable Thai

review_data.title: Good for everyone
review_data.content: Good taste for local and asian people. Good price. Duck red curry was terrific. Papaya salad or som tam is possible upon your request with on 15chf. Thai fried egg is also served if the restaurant is not busy.

review_data.title: Delicious thai food

review_data.title: Food was ok, staff very unfriendly
review_data.content: The food was ok. Precooked but the taste was good. The staff was horrible. The woman was the unfriendliest person in Zürich that I met during my stay here. Would not return here.

review_data.title: Good

review_data.title: Consistently tasty
review_data.content: The food is consistently tasty at an honest price point for Zürich. The dishes are varied but I usually stick with tofu or duck curry.

review_data.title: Not what expected
review_data.content: Taste of the food was ok. Nevetheless the food must have been days old and heaten up several times. On top of that staff was unfriendly. Overall, a place to forget and not go again

review_data.title: Very Cheap Thai Food

review_data.title: Good Thai Food!
review_data.content: The Thai Bamboo does serve good food which does taste quite authentic and is not overpriced like most other Asian Places in Zurich! I do recommend it.

review_data.title: Finest Thai in town
review_data.content: Situated near the Ruedenplatz, this rests serves the very best Thai food in town at a for Zurich ridiculously low price. Very fresh and tasty indeed. Ok, it's not the cosiest of restaurant but the nice girls behind the counter and the excellent food more...More

review_data.title: Try to avoid it
review_data.content: Came here because it was close to the hotel and was really hungry. Food is low cost low quality. Not a place I would recommend.

review_data.title: Reasonable price
review_data.content: The restaurant where you can find authentic Thai food at the old town of Zurich. You can enjoy quick Thai meal with 15 franc per person for lunch time. (excluding water or soft drink) It opens for fining dinner as well.

review_data.title: only OK

review_data.title: Pretty disappointing
review_data.content: Wanted to try the tom yum soup but they said they are not cooking and ask me to choose from the variety of food given there. The food were ok. Price is cheap. But I won't come back again.

review_data.title: Small Place - Big on Good Food!

review_data.title: Basic but tasty
review_data.content: It's the sort if place where you go, choose from what's pre-prepared and you're eating in minutes. Some seating outside and in. Enjoyable food though. Don't understand why it's not that busy. Reasonably priced for Zurich.

review_data.title: Average but good for something different

review_data.title: Good value Thai food

review_data.title: Mediocre food
review_data.content: Had a lunch with friends and it was a little bit disappointing. The meal is precooked, although fresh. It did not taste that well. The ladies working there were nice and polite.

review_data.title: This place is amazing!
review_data.content: This is a simple bar but the food is restaurant quality! The ratio of price to food quality is fantastic! Ive been eating there regularly for at least 4 years now and Im never disappointed!

review_data.title: very poor

review_data.title: Decent Thai Imbiss at a very decent price
review_data.content: Very friendly staff, very nice spicy Thai food at a decent price (compare to other places in Zurich). - Had a (at least to my taste) very nice dish at approx. 15 CHF. Regarding atmosphere, well what can I say, it's mainly a take-away with...More

review_data.title: Very cheap
review_data.content: Finding a cheap place (under 20fr.) to eat in Zürich is close to impossible, so seeing that Thai Bamboo serves a plate of Pad Thai Noodles for 10fr. tempted me. I went for Pad Thai Noodles with chicken, which increased the price to 15fr -...More

review_data.title: Cheap good food
review_data.content: A dish for only 15 CHF!! Their Tom Kha Gai and Red Curry are my favourites. Chicken in Satay Sauce is also beloved among my friends. Also don't forget their delicious Papaya Salad. The staffs are very friendly.

review_data.title: Gut und Günstig
review_data.content: Super auswahl an Currys für verhältnissmässig wenig Geld. Lage auch super mitten im Niederdorf. Nicht viel Platz zum drinn sitzen.
